title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Whisk eggs with grated Parmesan and pepper.
Combine hot pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka
summary: Grilled chicken marinated in spiced yogurt.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, spices, and lemon juice.
Grill or bake until fully cooked.
Serve with onion slices and chutney.
